TextEng: What artifacts are you talking about?
I guess you'll be leaving, then...
You'd better hurry if you want to catch up to those creatures.
Text: 저 괴물들을 따라잡으려면 서두르는 게 좋을 것 같은데요.

TextEng: Well, if the kobolds stole these artifacts, we should get them back!
Text: 그래요, 코볼트들이 이 유물들을 훔쳐갔다면 되찾아야죠!

TextEng: I'll help in whatever way I can.
Text: 제가 할 수 있는 모든 방법으로 도와드리겠습니다.

TextEng: You can count on me, Master Drogan. I won't fail you.
Text: 저를 믿으세요, 드로건 스승님. 실망시키지 않겠습니다.

TextEng: Are you sure, Master Drogan? If this is so important...
Text: 정말 괜찮으세요, 드로건 스승님? 이게 그렇게 중요한 일이라면...

TextEng: I assume the Harpers will reward me handsomely if I help out?
I'm not your errand <boy/girl>. Get somebody else to do it.
Text: 전 당신의 심부름꾼이 아닙니다. 다른 사람을 구하세요.

TextEng: What?! Why me?! I'll get killed!
Can't the Harpers help at all?
Tell me why are these artifacts so important.
Text: 왜 이 유물들이 그렇게 중요한지 말씀해 주세요.

TextEng: I will do my best. Do you have any advice?
But I haven't a clue where to start!
Text: 하지만 어디서부터 시작해야 할지 전혀 모르겠어요!

TextEng: I should go and get ready.
How is Master Drogan doing?
Is there something I can do to help Master Drogan?
Forget it. I've got better things to do.
I suppose you're right...
I don't do anything unless there's some profit in it.
A real adventure? I'm more worried about my own neck.
Text: 진짜 모험이라고요? 전 제 목숨이 더 걱정되는데요.

TextEng: I don't owe Drogan anything, thank you very much.
Text: 전 드로건에게 빚진 게 없습니다, 그만하세요.

TextEng: Alright, alright, enough. I'll see what I can do.
Text: 알았어요, 알았어요. 제가 뭘 할 수 있는지 보죠.

TextEng: And should I decide to keep these artifacts once I find them?
Text: 유물을 찾으면 제가 갖기로 하면 어떻게 하죠?

TextEng: Fine. But I won't be bossed around by you.
So the old dwarf is finally going to die, I take it?
Text: 그럼 늙은 드워프가 결국 죽게 되는군요, 그렇죠?

TextEng: Is Master Drogan going to be alright?
You just happened to arrive too late, huh? Likely story.
Text: 공교롭게 너무 늦게 도착했군요, 그렇죠? 그럴듯한 이야기네요.

TextEng: Why would anyone want to attack Master Drogan? I don't understand.
Text: 왜 누군가 드로건 스승님을 공격하려 했을까요? 이해가 안 되는군요.

TextEng: Shouldn't we chase down these kobolds? We can't let them get away!
Text: 코볼트들을 추격해야 하는 거 아닌가요? 그냥 놔둘 수 없잖아요!

TextEng: Why were you following these kobolds to begin with?
Text: 애초에 왜 이 코볼트들을 따라가고 있었습니까?

TextEng: No, no idea at all.
Someone who interferes in the business of others?
Text: 다른 사람 일에 간섭하는 사람 말인가요?

TextEng: The Harpers... it's some kind of secret organization, isn't it?
Aren't the Harpers some kind of secret society that fights evil?
Text: 하퍼들은 악과 싸우는 비밀 결사 아닌가요?

TextEng: Who are you to be demanding answers, anyway?
Text: 대체 누구시길래 대답을 요구하는 겁니까, 도대체?

TextEng: Thank you for your help, but... who are you?
I have recovered the mummified hand.
No, I don't need it.
I don't need the help, but I'll keep it.
If it can help, then yes... I'll hold onto it.
I have recovered the dragon's tooth.
I have recovered the mask.
Do you know anything about a sorceress named J'Nah?
Text: 즈나라는 마법사에 대해 아는 게 있습니까?

TextEng: Do you know anything about a dragon named Tymofarrar?
Text: 티모파라르라는 용에 대해 아는 게 있습니까?

TextEng: A kobold by the name of Deekin holds the tower statue... but he won't give it to me unless I help him.
Text: 디킨이라는 코볼트가 탑 조각상을 가지고 있는데... 도와주지 않으면 주지 않을 거라고 합니다.

TextEng: It seems the kobolds were ambushed by gnolls outside of Hilltop.
Text: 힐탑 밖에서 코볼트들이 놀들에게 기습을 당한 것 같습니다.

TextEng: No, but I do have some of the herbs you asked for.
Text: 아니요, 하지만 부탁하신 약초는 좀 가지고 있습니다.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Lie]</Start> No, I haven't found anything.
No, nothing yet.
I should be going.
Can you teleport me somewhere?
Nowhere, at the moment.
I need to find the party leader.
I need to go to the spot where I "died", so to speak.
No - maybe not just yet.
Yes - I'm ready.
I need to go back to the last place I used the ring.
Text: 반지를 마지막으로 사용한 곳으로 돌아가야 합니다.

TextEng: No, never mind.
Yes, I want to go.
I have some questions.
I don't have any more questions.
Tell me more about yourself.
I suppose you're right.
Would it hurt to get to know each other a bit?
Text: 서로를 좀 알아가는 게 나쁠 건 없지 않나요?

TextEng: I want to be sure you are who you say you are.
Text: 당신이 말한 그 사람이 맞는지 확인하고 싶습니다.

TextEng: He could have been just delirious from the poison.
Text: 독 때문에 그냥 헛소리한 걸 수도 있어요.

TextEng: I just thought a beautiful woman like yourself could use some decent company.
Text: 당신처럼 아름다운 여성에게 괜찮은 동반자가 필요할 것 같아서요.

TextEng: Can you tell me more about the kobolds?
I want to know more about the Harpers.
I'd very much like to become a Harper.
I'd have to think about it.
Not interested, thanks.
Tell me more about these artifacts.
Text: 이 유물들에 대해 더 말씀해 주세요.

TextEng: I want to ask something else.
Why are these items so dangerous?
Why were the artifacts kept here, then? Why not somewhere safer?
Text: 그럼 왜 유물들이 여기 보관된 겁니까? 더 안전한 곳이 있었을 텐데요?

TextEng: Tell me more about the mask.
Tell me more about the tower statue.
Text: 탑 조각상에 대해 더 말씀해 주세요.

TextEng: Tell me more about the dragon's tooth.
Text: 용의 이빨에 대해 더 말씀해 주세요.

TextEng: Tell me more about the mummified hand.
Text: 미라의 손에 대해 더 말씀해 주세요.

TextEng: I need some healing.
I have some of the herbs you asked for.
How else can you help me, exactly?
Text: 정확히 어떻게 더 도와주실 수 있습니까, 구체적으로?

TextEng: Do you have more crystals for the rings?
